mapper.sql: sd.id, sd.category_code, sd.category_name, sd.dict_name, sd.dict_value, sd.sort, sd.data_status, sd.gmt_create, sd.gmt_modify
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict(id, category_code, category_name, dict_name, dict_value, sort, data_status, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_dict(id, category_code, category_name, dict_name, dict_value, sort, data_status, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values
(#{item.id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.categoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dictName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dictValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dataStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update sys_dict
category_code = #{categoryCode},
category_name = #{categoryName},
dict_name = #{dictName},
dict_value = #{dictValue},
sort = #{sort},
data_status = #{dataStatus},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify},
where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_dict where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
